participant_1.background:
I'm taking my dog to the park in my dapper new suit.
my favorite meal is steak.
I am trying to be more mindful of my actions and words.
I'm afraid of being in a situation where I can't communicate with my wife.
My pet cat is the most interesting because it is a special breed of cat that is hypoallergenic, so my mother can actually enjoy spending time with it.

participant_2.background:
I was a country singer before I went into business.
i am a weirdo.
I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
pizza is my most favorite thing.
I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.

content.text: I'm taking my dog to the park in my dapper new suit.
I love dogs! I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
My pet cat is the most interesting because it is a special breed of cat that is hypoallergenic, so my mother can actually enjoy spending time with it.
I'm a weirdo, and I love pizza.
I used to be a country singer before I went into business.
I'm trying to be more mindful of my actions and words.
I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.
I'm afraid of being in a situation where I can't communicate with my wife.
